category.name: Build Environment
category.description: These variables control the behavior of the PlanetLab build environment.

variable.name: Fedora Core Release Version
variable.description: Version number of Fedora Core upon which to base the build environment. Warning: Currently, only Fedora Core 4 is supported.

variable.name: Fedora Core Base Architecture
variable.description: Base architecture of the build environment. Warning: Currently, only i386 is supported.

variable.name: Fedora Core Mirror URL
variable.description: Fedora Core mirror from which to install filesystems.

variable.name: CVS Root
variable.description: CVSROOT to use when checking out code.

variable.name: Bootstrap Build
variable.description: Controls whether MyPLC should be built inside of its own development environment.
